name: Silver Stacker
description:
A tribute to the one and only AgStacker, Steve Roberts.

In loving memory of Steve Roberts. Our guide, teacher, the one and only Agstacker and most importantly our friend!

Team Agstackers.com
Amy Roberts (Mrs. Stacker), Ingit, mojo(Scott), short stack, scrapman1077, drp270, slowpoke, jfloyd9, Blue Angel, Golden One, ag maniac, Freedom, Nola, 47protons, strea, tekhen, prospector.
